import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Container, Col, Row, Form, Button} from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './login.css' const Login = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); function handleLogin(e){ e.preventDefault(); } return (
Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} required/> We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} required/>

Dont't have an account? Signup

) } export default Login
